Generation IV.Diamond: An extremely cautious Pokémon. It cloaks its body with its fluffy ear fur when it senses danger.
Generation IV.Pearl: It is very conscious of its looks and never fails to groom its ears. It runs with sprightly jumps.
Generation IV.Platinum: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It sheds its fur twice a year. Its winter fur is soft and fluffy.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It sheds its fur twice a year. Its winter fur is soft and fluffy.

Generation V.Black: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.
Generation V.White: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.
Generation V.Black 2: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.
Generation V.White 2: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.

Generation VI.X: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.
Generation VI.Y: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It swings its ears like whips and strikes its enemies with them. It has an intensely combative disposition.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Mega Evolution awakens its combative instincts. It has shed any fur that got in the way of its attacks.

Generation VIII.Sword: Lopunny is constantly monitoring its surroundings. If dangers approaches, this Pokémon responds with superdestructive kicks.
Generation VIII.Shield: Once hot seasons are over, Lopunny's coat will be replaced with fur that holds a lot of insulating air in preparation for colder weather.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: An extremely cautious Pokémon that cloaks its body with its fluffy ear fur when it senses danger.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It likes to keep itself clean and never fails to groom its ears. It runs with sprightly jumps.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Its fur is warm and yet remarkably light. This Pokémon kicks as though it were a master of karate, driving back its opponents with ease.

Generation V.Black: Evolve Dream World Buneary or Trade
Generation V.White: Evolve Dream World Buneary or Trade
